question: What is NeuroStack TaskFlow?
answer: NeuroStack TaskFlow is an AI-powered project management tool designed to help teams automate task distribution and track productivity.

question: How do I create an account?
answer: Click the 'Sign Up' button on the homepage, enter your email, and create a password to get started.

question: Is there a free trial?
answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial on the Pro plan with no credit card required.

question: How do I reset my password?
answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login screen and follow the instructions sent to your registered email.

question: What are the pricing tiers?
answer: We offer three tiers: Free ($0), Pro ($19/mo), and Enterprise (Custom pricing).

question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from the 'Billing' section in your settings.

question: Does TaskFlow support dark mode?
answer: Yes, you can toggle dark mode in the 'Appearance' settings of your dashboard.

question: How do I invite team members?
answer: Go to the 'Team' tab and enter the email addresses of the colleagues you wish to invite.

question: Can I export my data?
answer: Yes, you can export your project data in CSV or JSON format from the 'Settings' menu.

question: Is my data secure?
answer: We use industry-standard AES-256 encryption to ensure all your project data remains private and secure.

question: Does TaskFlow have a mobile app?
answer: Currently, we have a responsive web app, and the native mobile apps for iOS and Android are in development.

question: How do I delete a project?
answer: Open the project settings and scroll to the bottom to find the 'Delete Project' button. Warning: This action is permanent.

question: What is the 'AI Assistant' feature?
answer: The AI Assistant helps you summarize long task descriptions and suggests deadlines based on team capacity.

question: Can I integrate TaskFlow with Slack?
answer: Yes, Slack integration is available for Pro and Enterprise users in the 'Integrations' marketplace.

question: How many tasks can I create on the free plan?
answer: The Free plan allows for up to 100 active tasks at any given time.

question: What happens when my trial ends?
answer: Your account will automatically move to the Free tier unless you choose to subscribe to a paid plan.

question: Do you offer discounts for non-profits?
answer: Yes, verified non-profit organizations are eligible for a 50% discount on all annual plans.

question: How do I enable Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)?
answer: You can enable MFA under 'Security Settings' using any standard TOTP app like Google Authenticator.

question: Can I assign multiple people to one task?
answer: Yes, TaskFlow allows multi-assignee support for complex collaborative tasks.

question: What is the maximum file upload size?
answer: Free users can upload files up to 10MB, while Pro users have a limit of 500MB per file.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: You can reach us via the in-app chat widget or by emailing support@neurostack.ai.

question: Can I track time spent on tasks?
answer: Yes, there is a built-in 'Start Timer' button on every task card for time tracking.

question: How do I archive a task?
answer: Right-click on a task and select 'Archive'. Archived tasks can be recovered from the 'Archive' folder.

question: Is there a limit on the number of projects?
answer: Free users can have 3 projects, while Pro users get unlimited projects.

question: Do you have an API for developers?
answer: Yes, our REST API documentation is available at developers.neurostack.ai.

question: Can I customize the Kanban board columns?
answer: Yes, you can add, rename, or delete columns in any project board.

question: How do I change my profile picture?
answer: Go to 'Profile Settings' and click on your current avatar to upload a new image.

question: What browsers are supported?
answer: TaskFlow supports the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.

question: Can I set recurring tasks?
answer: Yes, you can set tasks to repeat daily, weekly, or monthly using the 'Repeat' setting.

question: How do I see my team's activity log?
answer: The Activity Log is available in the 'Reports' section for Enterprise users.

question: Does TaskFlow support Markdown?
answer: Yes, task descriptions and comments fully support Markdown formatting.

question: Can I use TaskFlow offline?
answer: TaskFlow requires an internet connection, but we have a basic 'Offline Mode' that syncs changes once you're back online.

question: How do I leave a workspace?
answer: Go to 'Workspace Settings' and select 'Leave Workspace' at the bottom of the page.

question: What is the 'Priority' label?
answer: Priority labels (Low, Medium, High, Urgent) help you categorize tasks by importance.

question: Can I bulk-edit tasks?
answer: Yes, select multiple tasks using the checkboxes to apply bulk changes to status, labels, or assignees.

question: Does TaskFlow offer white-labeling?
answer: White-labeling is only available for our Enterprise-tier customers.

question: How do I create a task template?
answer: Save any existing task as a template by clicking the '...' menu and selecting 'Save as Template'.

question: Where can I find my invoices?
answer: Invoices are available for download in the 'Billing History' tab under 'Settings'.

question: Can I set reminders for deadlines?
answer: Yes, you can configure email or browser notifications for upcoming task deadlines.

question: How do I change the workspace name?
answer: Only Workspace Admins can change the name in the 'General Settings' tab.

question: Does the AI assistant support languages other than English?
answer: Yes, the AI Assistant currently supports Spanish, French, German, and Japanese.

question: How do I disable email notifications?
answer: You can customize your notification preferences in 'Settings' > 'Notifications'.

question: Is there a Gantt chart view?
answer: Yes, Gantt chart views are available for Pro and Enterprise users.

question: How do I restore a deleted task?
answer: Deleted tasks are kept in the 'Trash' for 30 days before being permanently removed.

question: Can I share a project with someone without an account?
answer: Yes, you can create a 'Public Share Link' that provides view-only access to a project board.

question: What happens if my payment fails?
answer: We will retry the payment 3 times over 7 days. After that, your account will be downgraded to the Free tier.

question: How do I change my primary email address?
answer: Contact support to update your primary login email for security reasons.

question: Does TaskFlow integrate with Google Calendar?
answer: Yes, you can sync your task deadlines with Google Calendar via the 'Integrations' page.

question: How do I report a bug?
answer: Please use the 'Report a Bug' option in the 'Help' menu to send a report to our engineering team.

question: Can I host TaskFlow on my own servers?
answer: No, TaskFlow is a cloud-only SaaS platform and does not support self-hosting.
